main event: Two spherical silver objects were observed flying near Great Falls, Montana on June 3, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes,The objects were about 3 feet in diameter and flying at an altitude of 10,000 feet,No visible means of propulsion was observed on the objects,The course of the objects was a straight line from East to West,One observer mentioned that the sighting was probably caused by a balloon.
